fields.name: Puma Big Cat Backpack Black
fields.description: 1. Polyester/nylon blend for lightweight durability. 2. Two-way zip opening and zip pockets on sides and front for optimum storage.  3. Small zip case for added convenience. 4. Adjustable and padded shoulder straps for added comfort. 5. Slate-black in colour. 6. 18\" length x 12\" breadth. This backpack is big on space and style. It is light as a feather and looks stunningly good.

fields.name: Puma Men Ferrari Black Fleece Jacket
fields.description: Black jacket made of blended fabric, has full sleeves with ribbed cuffs, full front zippered placket, spread collar, a patch pocket on the left chest, ferrari branding on left chest, Italy's flag colours above the pocket and at the hemline.

fields.name: Puma Men Ferrari Track Jacket
fields.description:
1. 85% cotton/15% polyester double knit jacket with fold over collar and ferrari logo styling
2. Contrast stripes along the sleeves
3. Ribbed, banded cuffs and hem
4. Zippered front pockets
5. Iconic Ferrari badge at left chest
6. Ferrari branding below back collar
7. Italy badge on the right sleeve
8. Available in the Rosso Corsa shade which is the red, international motor racing colour of cars entered by teams from Italy. Slip into this Scuderia Ferrari Track jacket and you'll have be blazing all over the city roads like a formula1 race car driver. The comfort quotient is a delight and the styling is a show stopper. The iconic Ferrari badge on the jacket might also give you the goosebumps.

fields.name: Puma Cat Trainer-WBL Football
fields.description:
1. A football for soccer games in all weather conditions
2. puma's hi-tech airlock valve to keep the ball bouncy at 8-12 PSI, 0.6-0.8 bar
3. Comes in a catchy white, black, lime coloured design with a puma leaping cat symbol
4. A size 5 football with 19 cm diameter.

fields.name: Puma Power Cat Trainer-OB Football
fields.description:
1. A football for soccer games in all weather conditions
2. puma's hi-tech airlock valve to keep the ball bouncy at 8-12 PSI, 0.6-0.8 bar
3. This fluorescent orange, black and white coloured ball can be spotted effortlessly during night games
4. A size 5 football with 19 cm diameter.

fields.description:
1. A football for soccer games in all weather conditions
2. puma's hi-tech airlock valve to keep the ball bouncy at 8-12 PSI, 0.6-0.8 bar
3. Comes in a catchy white, red, black coloured design with puma leaping cat symbol on it
4. A size 5 football with 19 cm diameter.

fields.name: Puma Power Cat Hard Ground Football
fields.description:
A football for soccer games on "Hard Grounds" in all weather conditions

2. puma's hi-tech perimeter balance technology 


3. Airlock valve to keep the ball bouncy at 10-15 PSI, 0.8-1.0 bar


4. Comes in a catchy white, red, black coloured design with puma leaping cat symbol on it


5. A size 5 football with 19 cm diameter.
